project.description: P2PAI-based multi-party computation training system that implements privacy-preserving distributed machine learning and collaborative model training.

federated.title: Select Distributed Training Mode
federated.subtitle: Choose the most suitable distributed training solution based on your privacy requirements and training objectives
federated.standardDesc: Traditional distributed training mode that allows viewing global training progress and statistics while protecting data privacy
federated.mpcDesc: Multi-party secure computation mode providing the highest level of privacy protection, only view your own training progress
federated.recommendation1: • If you want to understand overall training progress and participant information, choose **Single Model Node**
federated.recommendation2: • If your data is extremely sensitive and you only care about your own training results, choose **MPC Decentralized Model Node**
federated.recommendation3: • MPC mode may take longer to train, but provides stricter privacy protection
federated.recommendation4: • Both modes ensure your raw data never leaves the local environment

mpc.title: MPC Federated Learning Training
mpc.privacyDescription: In MPC mode, you cannot view other participants' information and global statistics. The system uses zero-knowledge proofs to ensure complete privacy protection.
mpc.securityDescription: Your data remains encrypted throughout the entire training process, and no participant can obtain your raw data or infer sensitive information.
